import React from 'react' import { ReactDOM } from 'react' const Popup = ({isOpen, close, children}) => { if(!isOpen) return null const POP_BOX = { position: "absolute", top: "100px", display: "inline-block", width: "200px", height: "300px", border: "solid", textAlign: "center", fontSize: "50px", zIndex: 1000, } const OVERLAY = { position: "fixed", top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)", zIndex: 1000, } return ( <>
{children}
) } export default Popup
